definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Plateaus and mountains make up 60 per cent of China's total area.
sentences.chinese: 高原和山地占中国总面积的百分之六十。

sentences.english: Our company is often the forest Limited liability company in the Tangshan area business agent.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是常林股份有限公司在唐山地区的代理商。

sentences.english: Wheels of mountain bikes range from 26 to 29 inches.
sentences.chinese: 车轮的山地自行车范围从26至29英寸。

sentences.english: Wildflowers With Mountains In Distance Kosciuszko NP, New South Wales, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 山地野花，南威尔士，澳大利亚。

sentences.english: Benefits of soil and water conservation was mainly studied after water retention was used in mountain orchard.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了山地果园施用保水剂后的蓄水保土效益。

sentences.english: The rights of equality and self-determination for the Hill Peoples must be guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 必须保障山地人民的平等权以及自治权。

sentences.english: Is price of beautiful Lida mountain bike warrior a number?
sentences.chinese: 美利达山地车勇士的价格是多少？

sentences.english: Individual mountain gorillas have never been re-introduced to the wild successfully.
sentences.chinese: 独个的山地大猩猩从来不能再度在野外成功存活。

sentences.english: The Oreqen people inhabiting the mountainous areas of the Xing'an Range are often simply called the "Mountain people".
sentences.chinese: 鄂伦春族分布在兴安岭山地，被称为“山岭上人”。

sentences.english: They snowboard over cliffs and mountain-bike down steep mountains.
sentences.chinese: 他们对滑雪的悬崖和山地自行车下陡峭的高山。

sentences.english: Tea grows well in these fertile mountain fields.
sentences.chinese: 茶树在这片肥沃的山地上长得很好。

sentences.english: Only about 380 of these Gorillas can be found in the DRC.
sentences.chinese: 刚果民主共和国境内约有380只银背山地大猩猩。

sentences.english: The Princesa Parc follows the traditional mountain style of Andorra.
sentences.chinese: 酒店位于普林斯萨帝遵循安道尔传统的山地风格。

sentences.english: More and more mountain bikers are moonriding — speeding down trails.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多骑山地车的人喜欢骑车沿小道飞速而下。

sentences.english: Li northern Mongolian Plateau, Calophyllum southern mountain exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古高原北疆立，琼崖山地南国展。

sentences.english: In addition to the Burmese, Ms. Sauerbrey pointed to the Cuba and Vietnamese Montagnards.
sentences.chinese: 除了缅甸人，她指出还有古巴人和越南的山地居民。
